String.string: [Event] Would You Like to Play a Game
Go meet Langon, who you see in front of the tavern over there.
Now, enjoy the festival as much as you want.
"Sure, I can do that."
Go meet the little popori 'Langon' in front of the West Beach Tavern.
Collect sand from sand piles near the water and make 3 sand castles.
Used construction sand to build a sand castle. (1/3)
Use construction sand to build sand castles.
Used construction sand to build a sand castle. (2/3)
Use construction sand to build sand castles.
Used construction sand to build a sand castle. (3/3)
"That actually does look like fun."
Go meet the little popori 'Langon' in front of the West Beach Tavern.
"Sure, I'll try that."
Find Wahmel, the manager of the melon bash game area.
Talk to Wahmel to participate in the melon bash game.
"Sounds pretty easy."
Go to Wahmel, the manager of the melon bash game area.
"This could be fun. I'm in."
Go to Chelton, the manager of the splash cannon game area.
Talk to Chelton to participate in the splash cannon shooting game.
"Okay, I'll play!"
Talk to Chelton, the manager of the splash cannon game area.
"Okay, I'm in!"
Go see Stefanna on the other side of the beach.
"I'm on my way."
Go meet Dolme the horn carver in a hut on the east coast.
Warthog Molar
Get a molar of a baykun warthog on Serpentis Isle.
Deliver the molar you got to Dolme.
"Sounds good."
Popori Statue
Take the popori statue to Ramsay, the owner of the East Beach Tavern.
"Thanks. It's been a blast so far."
